```{r}
# import libraries
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
n <- 120

tibble(
  x = accumulate(1:n, ~.x + cos(.y * (pi)^10), .init=0),
  y = accumulate(1:n, ~.x + sin(.y * (pi)^10), .init=0)
) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x, y)) +
    geom_polygon() +
    coord_equal() +
    theme_void()
```
